post.author: 이진경
post.content:
GTA-HTML Layout Assistant


  Self-Motivated individual needed to work in a creative GAY
POSITIVE environment building template driven websites. This is a
perfect entry-level position for those looking to get their feet wet in
the world of web design.

- Knowledge of human computer interactions and Internet design
standards
- Working knowledge of HTML and ability to hand code required
- JavaScript an asset
- Solid knowledge of Web/Internet based design and Website
Management
- Knowledge of Photoshop/Image Ready, Homesite Dreamweaver
required
- Knowledge of Xara X and ThumbsPlus and asset
- Results Driven Individual that can take direction and work
independently or as part of a team
- Organizational skills, multi-tasking and problem solving abilities
are a MUST
- Ability to work under pressure with tight deadlines a MUST
- Able to take initiative and self-manage workload
- Strong communicator with superior written communication skills

RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Produce template driven websites through specific methodology
- Properly document action items and deliverables
- Maintain and update the visual quality standards of the company
- Take part in brainstorming team meetings as necessary for
specific projects
- Occasionally design web based graphics

Applicants should respond by email and include a cover letter.


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent  

Contact Information
karl edwards
jobs@blathermatter.com
blathermatter inc
post.title: GTA-HTML Layout Assistant -Entry Level
